tickets.title: Enabling 2FA for Account Security
tickets.body: Interested in setting up two-factor authentication (2FA) for an extra layer of security on my E-Corp account. Seeking guidance on the process and best practices.

tickets.title: Phishing Attempt Alert
tickets.body: Received a suspicious email claiming to be from E-Corp, asking for sensitive information. Reporting it for investigation and guidance on how to proceed securely.

tickets.title: Device Security Assessment
tickets.body: Concerned about the security of the device I use to access E-Corp services. Requesting a security check and recommendations to ensure a secure environment for my transactions.

tickets.title: Forgotten Password
tickets.body: I seem to have forgotten my E-Corp account password and am unable to log in. Requesting assistance in resetting my password to regain access to my account securely. My menager is Lester Moore from E-Bank Network
